title: Draft Genome Sequence of Solibacillus kalamii, Isolated from an Air Filter Aboard the International Space Station

sections.Abstract: ABSTRACT We report here the draft genome of Solibacillus kalamii ISSFR-015, isolated from a high-energy particulate arrestance filter aboard the International Space Station. The draft genome sequence of this strain contains 3,809,180 bp with an estimated G+C content of 38.61%.
